sentences.english: For scabies, skin rash and Insecticidal, anti-itch.
Scabies is caused by pubic lice.
Trying to get a diagnosis for scabies can be very frustrating.
sentences.chinese: 想得到一张诊断为疥疮，可以很沮丧。

sentences.english: People interested in the above article Scabies , What Should You Do Now?
sentences.chinese: “感兴趣的人以上文章”疥疮，您应该做些什么呢？

sentences.english: There are several ways to treat scabies.
Everyone in the village has scabies and even some of the team are getting it.
sentences.chinese: 村中所有人都患了疥疮队工中也有好几个患上了。

sentences.english: People can be infested with scabies without having any symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何症状也可能感染上了疥疮。

sentences.english: Scabies is mainly a disease of people living together in cramped quarters.
sentences.chinese: 疥疮是一种拥挤环境居住的人的主要疾病。

sentences.english: Scabies is a skin condition caused by a mite called Sarcoptes scabiei.
sentences.chinese: 疥疮是由疥螨引发的一种皮肤病。

sentences.english: A drug that destroys the itch mite that causes scabies.
sentences.chinese: 一种药剂，用于杀灭引起发痒的疥疮的小虫。

sentences.english: When diagnostic scabies , the doctor wants to check assay to decide the diagnosis of scabies .
sentences.chinese: 在诊断疥疮时，医生要作检查化验确定疥疮的诊断。

sentences.chinese: 在诊断疥疮时，医生要作检查化验确定疥疮的诊断。

definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
common name for 花斑癣, tinea versicolor
pityriasis versicolor (aka tinea versicolor), blotchy skin condition common in tropical areas, common name 汗斑
